favourite.article: We should keep ourselves in the love of God by building up ourselves upon our holy faith and praying in the Holy Spirit (v. 20); thus we await and look for the mercy of our Lord that we may not only enjoy eternal life in this age but also inherit it for eternity!

Oh Lord Jesus! What a great love toward us You gave. From being a sinner You want us to enter into Your eternal Glory. From being nothing You made us to be joined with You in life, Your goal! Your majesty, Your glory! We thank and praise You!

For you to listen the audio of this hymn just click the link below:
soundcloud.com/singingandpsalming/jude-120-21
